data.eml:eml: A new species and new country records for the genus Leptobium Casey in the Palaearctic Region (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Paederinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Anlaş, Sinan (2017): A new species and new country records for the genus Leptobium Casey in the Palaearctic Region (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Paederinae). Zootaxa 4338 (1): 173-181, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4338.1.10
